title: AICA Controller Description
description: A full description of a controller in the AICA application framework.

name.title: Controller Name
name.description: The human-readable name of the controller.

description.title: Controller Description
description.description: The human-readable description of the controller and its behaviour.

brief.description: A brief (one-line) description of the controller for quick reference and tool-tips.
examples: Publishes robot state data as modulo encoded states
Controls joint space velocity from a task-space command under `~/state_command`

details.description: An optional detailed description of the controller.
examples: Joint state is published from joint state interfaces. Cartesian state is published if a URDF is available from which forward kinematics can be calculated. Force-torque sensor data is published if matching sensor state interfaces are available.

plugin.description: The registered class name of the controller plugin.

inherits.description: The parent class name of the controller plugin in case of inheritance.

control_type.description: The control type of the controller

virtual.title: Virtual Controller Class
virtual.description: If true, this property indicates that the controller is an abstract or virtual base class and not directly instantiable.

inputs.title: Controller Input Signals
inputs.description: The fixed input signals (subscriptions) of the controller.

outputs.title: Controller Output Signals
outputs.description: The output signals (publications) of the controller.

parameters.title: Controller Parameters
parameters.description: The parameters declared by the controller.
